note.original: (rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya tayo dhammā bhāvetabbā. katame tayo? savitakkasavicāro samādhi, avitakkavicāramatto samādhi, avitakkaavicāro samādhi. rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya ime tayo dhammā bhāvetabbā.) etthantare pāṭho katthaci dissati, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ passitabbo
note.snippet: , bhikkhave, abhiññāya tayo dhammā bhāvetabbā. Katame tayo? Suññato samādhi, animitto samādhi, appaṇihito samādhi – rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime tayo dhammā bhāvetabbā. ( )

note.original: ( ) etthantare pāṭho syā. kaṃ. ka. potthakesu na dissati
note.snippet: (Idamavoca bhagavā. Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.)

note.original: imā uddānagāthāyo sī. syā. kaṃ. pī. potthakesu na dissanti
